  • Cascade Engineering

    On this project I lead the front-end development process from kick-off to final QA. I collaborated with our director of development and a third-party designer to bring to life a robust Drupal 7 site. The requirements were out of the scope of a traditional Drupal site but with the help of Drupal's contrib modules: Entity and Paragraphs, we built a highly flexible site where content administrator's can easily compose web pages in different layouts, not constrained to a fixed template. During the process, I defined front-end build tools and established new techniques to solve challenges and allow for pivots along the way.

    Nov 2016 | Symmetri Marketing/Commercial Progression

    Role: Lead Front-End Developer

    Build Tools: Grunt, Bower, SASS, Bourbon, Vagrant, Drush, Features(module), Git

    Visit Site

  • IDL Worldwide

    Praised to be one of Symmetri's most successful development projects; this was the first project I worked with the Commercial Progression team, after the Symmetri/Commerical Progression merger. The project was completed under estimated budget and ahead of deadline. The site was built in Drupal 7 using Zurb Foundation sub-theme. I gathered development requirements and collaborated with our account directors and third-party designer.

    Jul 2016 | Symmetri Marketing

    Role: Lead Front-End Developer

    Build Tools: Grunt, Bower, SASS, Zurb Foundation, Vagrant, Drush, Features(module), Git

    Visit Site

about

I am a creative Front-End Developer with around 5 years of professional experience, based in Chicago. I strive for delivering high-quality, fully responsive user interfaces while using best practices and incorporating most efficient tools. I enjoy solving problems, collaborating with folks to create the best work we can possibly achieve, and overall making seamless beautiful websites.

skillset

  • DOM manipulation
  • Drupal custom theming
  • Vagrant/Git/Node workflow
  • Mobile-first responsive development
  • IE 8/9/10/11, iOs, Android, Modern browsers compliance

best at

HTML5/CSS3/SASS/jQuery/JS/PHP
